title: stutter in game?

replies.body: Does this choppiness happen at any specific point like a team fight or is it just random?  I'm also curious if it might be a network issue like packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these impacted games, and let me know what results you find.
